name: Rolling Abyssal Thunder
description:
The character to which this is attached cannot use Skills.
End Phase: Deal 6 Piercing DMG to the character to which it is attached and remove the effect.
descriptionraw: The character to which this is attached <color=#FFFFFFFF>cannot use Skills</color>.\n<color=#FFFFFFFF>End Phase:</color> Deal 6 $[K5] to the character to which it is attached and remove the effect.
